name: Tic Tac Toe: Total War
description:
Tic Tac Toe to the next level!

Features:

Classic mode - The classic, timeless, universal tic tac toe game that we all know and love

War mode - Classic mode with an extra dimension added, this mode was named for the fact that you have multiple battlefields to keep in mind. Its more challenging than it first seems

Developer's note: This is a game I made for fun and to practice my game development skills as certain circumstances are preventing me from making this my job. Usually I don't update my games after I first post them but for this I hope keep adding more to it till it becomes more professional. I especially hope to add more game modes so that I can explore all the different ways I can modify the classic tic tac toe game.

Want to help me improve this project? I'd love to hear your feedback here: https://forms.gle/TQR3yo7YxXV47SCZ6

Thanks!
